title: Millionaires
lyrics:
We got holes in the floorboard
We got cracks in the window
We got no money in the bank
No gas in the tank
No jingle in my jang
Baby don't you think that we could...



Take our love, turn it into money

We'd be learning rolling dough, let me tell you honey

We'd be millionaires

You know that we'd be millionaires (Throw it up in air)

If I could buy your kiss baby you would think

It'd be falling from the sky, we can make it rain

We'd be millionaires (Millionaires)

You know that we'd be millionaires (Throw it up in air)



We got Chevy engine

The kind that's lifted up high

We got engine smoke, radio broke

Four bogged tires rolling down the road



And we can take our love, turn it into money

We'd be learning rolling dough, let me tell you honey

We'd be millionaires

You know that we'd be millionaires (Throw it up in air)

If I could buy your kiss baby you would think

It'd be falling from the sky, we can make it rain

We'd be millionaires (Millionaires)

You know that we'd be millionaires (Throw it up in air)



I wonder what it's like to have more than you need

Hundred dollar bills hanging from the trees

Diamonds, swimming pools, anything you pleased

Honey I'm just dreaming but if we could



Take our love, turn it into money

We'd be learning rolling dough, let me tell you honey

We'd be millionaires

You know that we'd be millionaires (Throw it up in air)

If I could buy your kiss baby you would think

It'd be falling from the sky, we can make it rain

We'd be millionaires (Millionaires)

You know that we'd be millionaires (Throw it up in air)
